short_summary: Provide technical translation services (English to French) on an as and when required basis to support various projects and services requirements.
description: Provide experienced technical translators who are capable of producing high-quality written translations in English-to-French translation services - designate
full_summary:
**Technical Translation Services**
----------------------------------
### Tender Announcement Details

* **Reference Number:** PW-23-01025752
* **Solicitation Number:** 22-58137
* **Publication Date:** Thursday, February 13, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** Thursday, April 6, 2023 at 2:00 PM EST
* **GWAC:** R109D (Translation Services)

### Solicitation Description

The National Research Council Canada (NRC) invites interested vendors to submit a proposal for the provision of technical translation services (English to French) as per the requirement defined in Appendix A.

The scope of this Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) includes the translation of documents from English to French for the NRC. The services will be performed on an as-required basis. The NRC expects approximately 5 Standing Offer Agreements (SOAs) to be established as a result of this RFSO.

**Key Highlights:**

* Standing Offers will be valid until March 31, 2025.
* The option for renewal for a maximum period of four (4) subsequent one-year periods is available.
* The Contractor will be required to perform the work in accordance with the NRC's quality and security standards.

**Selection Criteria:**

* Contractors will be assessed based on their technical and financial capabilities.
* A detailed evaluation plan will be provided on the Canada BUs (buyandsell.gc.ca) website.

### Requirements for Bid Submissions

* Bidders must submit their electronic Technical and Financial Proposals in two separate attachments by 2:00 PM EST on April 6, 2023.
* Proposals must include the front page of this RFSO duly completed.
* A copy of the After Sales Support agreement template (NRC ASP9-AUS) must be attached to the proposal.

### Clarifications and Questions:

* All inquiries must be sent in writing at least 5 business days prior to the closing date.
* Enquiries will be answered on a best effort basis, unless their publication would reveal confidential information.

**Tania Backes**
**Contracting Authority**
`<tania.backes@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca>`

### File Size Limitation:

* Proposals must not exceed 10 MB in file size.

### Interpretation Clause

* The English version of the Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) is the authoritative document.
 
### Important Dates

* **Publication Date:** Thursday, February 13, 202
